description: Application to vary Condition 1 of planning permission 2023/1416 (change of use of part of existing building from light industrial (use class E(g)) to temporary synagogue (Use Class F1) to provide covered structure to rear of the building and associated alterations to the building facade.
decision_conditions: <p>The synagogue (Use Class F1) hereby permitted shall be operated for a limited period only until 06/10/2025 on or before which date the use shall be discontinued.</p><p>REASON: In the interest of neighbouring occupiersâ€™ amenity and land use terms.&nbsp;</p>
<p>All windows and doors should remain closed during worship times.</p><p>REASON: To safeguard against noise nuisance to occupiers of the adjoining residential properties.&nbsp;</p>

<p>The temporary F1 use hereby allowed must not be begun until such a time that the current synagogue use at 73 Clapton Common has ceased.</p><p>REASON: In the interest of the amenity of neighbouring occupiers.&nbsp;</p>

<p>All new external finishes in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</p>

<p>The use hereby permitted may only be carried out between 0700 and 2400 hours daily.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the use operates in a satisfactory manner and does not unduly disturb adjoining occupiers or prejudice local amenity generally.</p>

<p>The noise level from all plant and machinery included in the approved development shall at all times remain 5dB(A) below background levels when measured at any nearby residential window or other sensitive receptor if appropriate (add/delete as appropriate)</p><p>REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise.</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p>Before the development is first occupied, space shall be made available for the secure parking of cycles, with 9 cycle stands within the site, before the use is first&nbsp; commenced.</p><p>The cycle parking spaces shall be retained until the temporary use ceases.</p><p>REASON: To ensure that a reasonable provision is made within the site for the parking of bicycles in the interests of discouraging car use, relieving congestion in surrounding streets and improving highway conditions in general.</p>
